body:
Concept ACK.

> Now GUIX build for the i686-linux-gnu host is broken

As far as I'm aware, compiling still works, and I assume the binaries produced run? It's just that given we don't support `i686-linux-gnu` in our symbol / security checks, the build wont "complete". However given we aren't planning on supporting `i686-linux-gnu` in Guix going forward, removing this code seems fine.

> As far as I'm aware, compiling still works, and I assume the binaries produced run? It's just that given we don't support `i686-linux-gnu` in our symbol / security checks, the build wont "complete".

Correct.

#### Guix builds on `x86_64`:
